title: Refuse Chute/Garbage Chute: In all residential buildings, refuse chutes/garbage chute may be provided with openings on each floor or on mid-landing
clause_text: Refuse Chute/Garbage Chute: In all residential buildings, refuse chutes/garbage chute may be provided with openings on each floor or on mid-landing. Design and specifications of refuse chutes shall be in accordance with provisions of IS 6924.
